name: Furniture Assembly
description: Assembly of new furniture items such as beds, tables, chairs, etc.

name: Painting
description: Interior or exterior painting of walls, ceilings, and other surfaces.

name: Carpentry
description: Repairing or installing wooden structures, shelves, cabinets, etc.

name: Plumbing
description: Fixing leaks, unclogging drains, installing or repairing fixtures.

name: Electrical Repairs
description: Fixing electrical issues, replacing outlets, switches, or light fixtures.

name: Tile and Grout Work
description: Installation, repair, or replacement of tiles and grout in bathrooms, kitchens, etc.

name: Door and Window Repair
description: Fixing or replacing damaged doors, windows, locks, and hinges.

name: Gutter Cleaning
description: Removing debris and leaves from gutters to ensure proper drainage.

name: Pressure Washing
description: Cleaning exterior surfaces using high-pressure water spray.

name: General Maintenance
description: Performing routine maintenance tasks to keep properties in good condition.

name: Drywall Repair
description: Fixing holes, cracks, or damaged areas in drywall surfaces.

name: Deck and Fence Repair
description: Repairing or replacing damaged deck boards, railings, or fence panels.

name: Appliance Installation
description: Installing or replacing household appliances such as refrigerators, dishwashers, etc.

name: Light Fixture Installation
description: Installing or replacing light fixtures, chandeliers, or ceiling fans.

name: Locksmith Services
description: Unlocking doors, changing locks, or making duplicate keys.

name: Shelving and Storage Solutions
description: Installing shelves, cabinets, or organizing storage spaces.

name: Bathroom Repairs and Upgrades
description: Repairing or upgrading faucets, toilets, showerheads, or bathroom fixtures.

name: Minor Carpentry
description: Repairing or replacing minor damaged wooden structures or furniture.

name: Hanging Artwork and Mirrors
description: Mounting and hanging artwork, mirrors, or picture frames.

name: Ceiling Fan Installation
description: Installing or replacing ceiling fans for better air circulation.

name: Automobile Mechanic
description: Repairing and servicing automobiles, including engine maintenance, brakes, and suspension.

name: Glazier
description: Cutting, installing, and repairing glass for windows, mirrors, and glass fixtures.
